short_summary: Purchase of 225,000 liters of naval distillate fuel
description: Purchase of 225,000 liters of naval distillate fuel to be delivered to HMCS Margaret Brooke at Rankin Inlet, Nunavut.
full_summary:
**Tender Title**: W307B-25D032-A Request for Proposal: Arctic Naval Distillate Fuel Supply

**Reference Number**: WS4641057668-Doc4641391310

**Publication Date**: June 19, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**: July 8, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT

# Procurement Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids from qualified suppliers to provide Naval Distillate Fuel to the Department of National Defence (DND) at one Arctic location. The required product is diesel fuel marketed as Naval Distillate Fuel.

## Delivery Location and Quantity

* Rankin Inlet, Nunavut: One shipment of 225,000 liters via ship-to-ship delivery to Royal Canadian Navy Ship HMCS Margaret Brooke.
* Anticipated Delivery Date: September 14, 2024 (subject to confirmation by DND)

## Land Claims Agreements

The following Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements apply to this procurement:

* **Nunavut Land Claims Agreement**: For deliveries to Rankin Inlet, Nunavut, this agreement applies.

## Notice and Tender procedure

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice URL**: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20066343?extsite=MjAwNjYzNDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Contact Information**

* Contracting Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact: Bobbi MacLeod, PSPC/SPAC (bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Requirements**

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by July 8, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT. Late submissions will be declared non-conformant. Full details are outlined in the RFP document.

**Commodity Code and Trade Agreements**

* **UNS CPC**: 15101505 (Diesel Fuel)
* **Trade Agreements**: CSPC (Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership), AECG (Accord économique et commercial global) Canada - UE (European Union),
